dispatchers.name: prism_doc
dispatchers.capabilities: Read/write to data/docs/, markdown summarizer, roadmap parser, action tracker parser, bulk migration

dispatchers.name: prism_nl_hook
dispatchers.capabilities: NL description -> parse -> compile -> validate -> sandbox -> deploy pipeline, LLM-assisted compile, approval workflow

findings.finding: prism_doc provides structured document management with hook-protected writes
prism_nl_hook implements full NL-to-hook pipeline with approval workflow for LLM-generated hooks
Both dispatchers have clean engine wiring with no orphaned methods
prism_doc is file-I/O only â€” no domain engine delegation
